programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to “drive a mile in each other’s wheels” in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwing’s motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that they’re better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signal’s one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chanterelle sees how good Lilit is at painting, she offers to help her dig into her talent.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is very excited: tonight, a rare and extremely stinky plant is going to bloom! But he already promised Mush-Mush to play their favourite game. When he chooses the flower instead, Mush-Mush is angry and the two friends stop talking. But when Mush-Mush realises that Chep is about to miss the blooming, he decides he won’t let that happen and helps his friend!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit take their compost meals back to their home-tree to eat, they think they have made a great new discovery.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are playing dares and having a lot fun. All the Mushables are happy for them except Fung and Miff who keep mocking them.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: While they are enjoying the longest day of the summer, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit realise that the forest is drying out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy lands in a temple where he finds a crystal skull which gives you the power to sow discord within a group. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings don’t miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to “gold leaf” the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that it’s his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game “Floor is Lava.” They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play “for real”!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints – pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but it’s too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists he’s an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy – the winner being the first to climb “The Big One”, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they won’t notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has to give the Mushlets a talk about spiders. But talking in front of a group makes Chep nervous. Mush-Mush offers to do it instead. Problem is Mush-Mush’s knowledge of spiders is so bad he ends up getting caught by one!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers want Amanita to join in telling monster stories. But Amanita doesnt believe in monsters. So they take her on a monster hunt and find more than they imagined.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to be brave enough to join in the daring games that Mush-Mush and Lilit like to play. So he gets some protective moss pants that make him not only indestructible but also fashionable… and a bit cocky. Woo, it’s the new Chep!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush really wants to get over his fear of snakes. Truff really wants to get over his fear of ants. So they team up to help each other overcome their fears ... maybe.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpot offers to look after the Mushies so Mushpie can get a well-earned rest. He thinks it will be easy. It is not easy! The Mushies end up pushing both Mushpot and Starmush to their limit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. He puts his hand inside and has fun pretending that the puppet is strangling him. The Lemmings believe that the puppet is a Super Lemming whos stronger than Grizzy and start to obey it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell. But since the object was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first. And the Lemmings are using the sole bar of soap in the house as a bobsleigh.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange American Indian figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. He immediately tries to activate the reverse procedure, but the Lemmings steal the figurine in order to turn into a partridge and fly away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. Instead of showing the reflection of the person who holds it, the mirror shows an idealized vision of his surroundings. Whether it be Grizzy or the Lemmings, everyone sees the world of his dreams, and no one wants to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan, the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. Grizzy is sure that a stick like that would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings, who have become sorcerers apprentices?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Whilst trying to stop the Lemmings from playing with a crate of firework rockets Grizzy is literally carried away with them when the largest specimen shoots off

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share, Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. Amidst the debris, they discover a strange pack: an army tent with all the necessary equipment to recreate a home in nature. Its the chance to discover the joys of camping in the wild.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables embedded piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings catch a grasshopper that can give you whatever your heart desires in abundance. All you need to do is set the grasshopper on its head while concentrating hard on what you want. As discretion is not the Lemmings’ strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that it’s his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a new passion: magic Chinese lanterns that they use for sound and light performances. Grizzy is not very enthusiastic about this new electric activity which keeps him from sleeping. While Grizzy thinks that he got rid of their lanterns, the Lemmings discover new high-tech lanterns capable of making even more of a ruckus.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay hands on an ancient console that lets you play life-sized games in the real world. The console emits magical streams of energy that randomly pick avatars to confront one another. Grizzy is chosen as the hero. He must leap onto platforms and confront both enemies and a fearsome leader: a panda equipped with bamboo sticks. The Lemmings are obviously in control of the joystick!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As the Lemmings rummage through an abandoned delivery tricycle filled with strange objects, they discover a delicious treasure: Yummy-filled Chinese brioches! Grizzy steals their tasty bounty and heads off to enjoy it alone in the cabin. The Lemmings find a mask in the tricycle that terrifies anyone who looks at it when it’s being worn by someone. The Lemmings intend to use their horrific new power to recover their stolen treats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a jar of Yummy which is mysteriously sucked up into a strange gravestone locked with a puzzle. Grizzy smashes open the gravestone but it contains another box made of unbreakable wood protected with a codex system. Our characters crack the code and are sucked into the box in turn. They discover that to get out, they will have to resolve a series of new puzzles, each one more complex than the last.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a giant home cinema screen that transforms his favorite documentary film into an incredible light and sound experience. But his pleasure is ruined by the Lemmings’ fiesta. While he chases after his housemates to destroy their disco equipment, he discovers with astonishment that Asian clones of himself and the Lemmings are also engaged in a high-speed pursuit.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Velmas got an interview at the prestigious Kingston University the most selective school in the country. The only catch? The dean wants her and the rest of the Scooby gang to figure out why the ghost of Elias Kingston the schools founder is haunting Kingstons book-filled halls!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar een Victoriaans moordmysteriefeest, zodat ze zich mooi kunnen aankleden en een nepmysterie kunnen oplossen voor de verandering. Maar wanneer een onthoofde graaf (DAVID KAYE) daadwerkelijk mensen begint te ontvoeren, moet de gang boef pakken!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Green Arrow and his Arrowplane, Goldie, come to help Batman take on the Riddler. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around that she brings Goldie to life and the two become BFFs. But when Goldie eventually has to leave, Batwing learns that saying goodbye doesnt always mean forever!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when hes in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel - if he can convince her to stop playing long enough to focus on their mission!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Queen Beatrice hires The Looney Builders to build a workshop in her beehive where there is one rule the crew has trouble following.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs, Lola, Daffy, Porky and Tweety utilise their vehicles to tackle construction projects, all the while acquiring valuable insights.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Beans landlady isrushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isnt the only thing that flies and in the end its Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A milkman accidentally walks off with a maritime curio belonging to Bean _ who indignantly follows him to the bottling plant at the local dairy, determined to retrieve it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a mishap involving a bucket of grey paint, Lamput ends up back at the Lab, working undercover as the newest Doc on the block.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput can’t stop reading and gets caught! Back at the lab, the story intrigues everyone who is brought on a captivating adventure – featuring Lamput, Specs and Skinny in the leading role of a classic folktale. Robinput and his mates fight evil dictatorship for the perfect bedtime story.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: There’s Football Fever as the Docs and Lamput go to watch the game! In the second half of the game, they end up on the pitch! Lamput causes havoc for the Docs as he disguises himself as flags, jerseys, whistles and even the football, but as they get closer to the 90th minute, they realise that it’s a team effort to win, and the game needs everyone to be on the same side.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine with a jewellery ad showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the rangers engagement ring to his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his temple, Grizzy is transformed into an exceptionally intelligent being capable of predicting events to come far in advance. With his way above average IQ, not only will he be able to provide himself with the latest high-tech comfort, getting rid of the Lemmings should be a piece of cake.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gleefully discovers that he can print images taken with the rangers camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. He decides to immortalize and frame himself…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A van pulls up to the rangers cabin to deliver a crate of jars of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butchs tail. Feeling awful, she brings the alley cat into her home until hes feeling better. Butch is finally getting what hes wanted, much to Toms chagrin, especially now that Gingers having him take care of the poor injured cat. Jerry revels in the situation until he realizes that two idiot cats are more trouble than one and Jerrys getting his butt whooped. Now Jerry must prove that Butch is rehabilitated in order to return him to the alley where he belongs and return his life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Problems result after Tom and Jerry use too much of a witches disappearance potion.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its Toms wedding day! Hes getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that were experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it cant possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry is left alone in an empty house after Rick, Ginger and Tom are nowhere to be seen.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry listen to the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate end chasing a superior opponent.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: We open on a SOLD sign in front of what will be Rick and Gingers house. Inside, the house is empty – no Rick, no Ginger, no Tom, no furniture. Just Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors – the place all to himself. That is until the front door opens and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home. Ginger screams having just seen a mouse and tells Rick to get Tom out of the moving van. Like most cats in a new place, Tom doesnt want to come out from beneath the recently placed couch, but Ginger demands he catch that mouse! And so we watch the beginning of a lifelong adversarial relationship unfold one gag at a time!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show, but when Batman needs their help, they must choose between winning the competition and their responsibilities to fight crime.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batwheels face off with the Legion of Zoom as they attempt to recover Batmans stolen cowl from the villainous vehicles.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Scooby Gang enter Dickens classic ?A Christmas Carol?, as they try to get to the bottom of the mysterious ghost tormenting Scrooge in 1843 England. Unfortunately, the Ghosts begin to convince Velma shes on a disastrous path of her own.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Unhappy about a mystery-free, three-day, cross-country train trip with the gang, Fred is pleasantly surprised to discover a monster mystery on board. Hes less pleasantly surprised however, when that mystery is interrupted by a second mystery, then a third, then a fourth…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings inherit a crate that fell off a Canadian army convoy. Inside, a case emits a sort of laser beam that divides objects into multiple miniaturized versions of themselves.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Near the supermarket a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket the Lemmings dream of, and a piece of costume jewelry that Grizzy imagines himself giving to his lady-love.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A bouquet of flowers causes Tom no end of trouble.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tuffy surprises Jerry with a visit from the actor who plays his favourite TV show character The Masked Mouse. Turns out the actor is a prima donna who makes everyones life miserable.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Pretending to be butterflies, Tuffy And Jerry cause all sorts of trouble in the house, until the Duke catches Tuffy with the intention of adding him to his butterfly collection.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger is asked by her mother to watch her dog, Goliath, while she is away. Goliath is a gentle giant, unless you wake him from his nap!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Mice from Mars make a return visit and set about making mischief between Spike and Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom uses a newfangled scientific machine to make copies off himself creating a living nightmare for Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Join Tom and Jerry in their new show while they fight for territory and dominance! This mischievous duo is up to new and hilarious shenanigans, will they finally be caught?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its a battle royale over the last box of donuts.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike demonstrates for Tuffy what it takes to be a dog.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a royal documentary, Mr. Bean decides to redecorate his room in Buckingham Palace style—resulting in hilarious wallpaper chaos.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean races his neighbor to grow a giant marrow, chasing prize money and a photo in the papers—but chaos and comedy ensue along the way.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman – and the mission – are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast! But when the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbird’s beach day plans, Bam helps him realize that even though things didn’t go exactly as planned, they still had a great day!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage. As they adapt to their temporary home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of what you have.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batman refuses to engage Joker in a race, Prank goads Bam into a rematch. Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares and take the high road?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: The crew celebrates the Lunar New Year, and Bugs and Lola go missing during the Lion Dance.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders take turns distracting Petunia as they build her a big surprise birthday cake in the back yard.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a float to lead the Flower Parade, but Porky won’t settle for anything less than Porky Perfect.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings... clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger’s collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages a space station.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to try out the brand new packaging format of chocolate spread that he discovers in the rangers cupboard: a yummy-looking XXL jar. And he does not intend to share it with the Lemmings. After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs come up with a new gadget, giving them the ability to take on the animal’s strength to take Lamput down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput and Specs find themselves on an island. Spec learns a harsh lesson on listening.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput’s been caught! The Docs don’t have much to do now but to give tours to visiting students. Until one of these students, Tuzki specifically, gets lost. Will Tuzki find his way back to class? Not unless Lamput has something to do with it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Dr. Bigby upgrades Bot to a Bot-y Guard. When Tom breaks in and sets off Bots defensive systems, things get out of control and Bot terrorizes the whole lab crew. Jerry and Napoleon must figure out how to disarm Bot without hurting him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When the witches herb garden is destroyed, Tom sets a trap to capture the pest responsible. Quackers helps him but is unknowingly the pest Tom seeks to capture.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Jerry sneaks into the party set up to steal some cheese while Tom is sleeping. Tom wakes up and chases Jerry across a table filled with all kinds of food. During the chase, Tom eats a melon which turns him into a sphere shape and Jerry eats a piece of cheese which turns him into a triangle shape.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry lose Gingers wedding ring down the drain, they send Jerry through the pipes to retrieve it, but the drain leads out to the beach!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Dr. Bigby creates an amazing helmet that accidentally turns Tom into a genius. Napoleon, Jerry and Hamster all work together to take down the newly smart Tom who is now building a mouse-destroying weapon.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Skullie warns Tom that its almost midnight, so hed best be on alert for one of the Catsylvania ghouls to show up. Tom reaches for a towel to wipe the soap out of his eyes but is shocked to discover that hes not using a towel at all, but a Mummy-cats wrap! Soon, the Mummy-cat finds ways to freak out Tom and befuddle him, Jerry and Tuffy all over the house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry work to create a perfect perfume for Toodles, and end up creating a storm from the clouds of perfume.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Butch both arrive to ask out Toodles, their competitive behavior prompts her to send them away to a charm school she recently attended. But how will they fare in the grueling etiquette courses taught by elegant cat instructors?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Things go awry when Cates orders Tom to clean and inspect the family automobile. Tom, Jerry and Tuffy end up taking the car into the countryside and doing their best to control it. As Tom reads and attempts to follow the instruction manual, Jerry and Tuffy help, but they also suffer many near-misses.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Butch gets muscled out of his alley by a bullying runt of an alley cat and Tom, Jerry and Spike team up to help Butch win back his territory (and keep him out of theirs).

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry help a runaway champion horse become competitive again.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Jerry sneaks into the party set up to steal some cheese while Tom is sleeping. Tom wakes up and chases Jerry across a table filled with all kinds of food. During the chase, Tom eats a melon which turns him into a sphere shape and Jerry eats a piece of cheese which turns him into a triangle shape.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A magicians hat is left behind at Ginger and Ricks house. Jerry runs into it, but when Tom reaches in after him, all he gets are multiple magician props. Tyke and Spike soon join in, and the top hat continues to wreak havoc.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: In Catsylvania, a strange flying bug bites Tom, transforming him into a Tom-sized bug monster. Van Mouseling saves the village with an old-fashioned canister of bug poison, and Tom flies off to the abandoned castle on the hill. But Toms troubles arent over yet! Inside, he must deal with huge spider webs and a spider the size of a truck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While mopping the kitchen floor, Tom uses an odd-looking sponge on a plate to clean up the mess. But the sponge turns out to be a rare truffle, which the estates new pig ate. To pacify Cates, Tom and Jerry must find out whether the animal is also good at hunting truffles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger places her grannys old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as its sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cates appears and assigns Tom the job of sweeping the estates chimneys, warning him not to upset the Duchesss new exotic pet bird. Unfortunately, both the pet bird and a stork at the top of the chimney think Jerry is a worm. Soon chaos breaks out, hurting Toms cleaning efforts.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about how they feel when things change.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build Kathy Bat an upside-down radio station, Porky has concerns but doesn’t speak up.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Queen Beatrice hires The Looney Builders to build a workshop in her beehive where there is one rule the crew has trouble following.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs, Lola, Daffy, Porky and Tweety utilise their vehicles to tackle construction projects, all the while acquiring valuable insights.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Penelope Pussycat to build a fashion runway in France where they are encouraged to make their design bigger and more fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China, but the crew faces a major setback and Bugs worries about letting down his favourite chef.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage. / Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show, but when Batman needs their help, they must choose between winning the competition and their responsibilities to fight crime.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover! / To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guy’s making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells … bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush wants to be just like Starmush when he grows up, because he’s convinced that Starmush is the most awesome Mushable there is and that his daily life must be extraordinary. So, Mush-Mush trails Starmush, which soon annoys the Mushelder. To get rid of Mush-Mush, Starmush decides to live up to the Mushler’s fantasies…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has come across a new seedpod specimen. Mushpot warns him not to take it though. But the temptation is too much and Chep can’t resist taking the seedpod and opening it… to find it is full of itchy powder! Argh! Mush-Mush and Lilit do their best to help their friend, but it seems like the only way Chep can get rid of the itching is to ask Mushpot for a remedy…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush can’t wait to show his tricks of forest illusion to everyone.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is very proud he invented a new game called Fruity Bounce, where he and his friends bounce as high as possible on the bouncier fruits they can find.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush discovers that Morel is afraid of the dark, he suggests that Chep, Lilit and he take the Mushlets to their first overnight forest camp

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are always up to new adventures, Bolly has dubbed them The Adventurers. Flattered, our friends invite Bolly to choose his challenge to become an Adventurer too. Bolly will have to be the first Mushable to set foot somewhere. Mushton being crowded, Mush-Mush suggests they find an island, somewhere on the giant lake…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals’ features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, it’s an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases one’s sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy is about to go to bed, he ousts the Lemmings who are holding a surprise party in the cabin. The Lemmings land in a Mayan Temple devoted to the moon. While toying with an ancestral console, the Lemmings set off a cosmic phenomenon that brings the moon, which is now the size of a disco ball, to the temple. In its aura, gravity becomes very weak. Enough to get rid of Grizzy and have a very original fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy does his best to get rid of the Lemmings and enjoy some peace and quiet in the cabin, but each time they come back with a new and even more-disturbing activity. When he sees some penguins marching in a perfectly disciplined line, Grizzy decides to teach the Lemmings how to behave in his presence. He locks himself up with them inside the garage, which has been transformed into an elementary school classroom. Grizzy is determined to make discipline reign but he has forgotten about the Lemming’s natural penchant for bedlam.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight once again and cause an accident with Santa Claus’ sled. The Lemmings rush to the crash site and get their hands on Santa’s magic bag. While Grizzy is tidying up the cabin after their fight, he is baffled to see the Lemmings come back him, quiet and calm. The rodents break out into Christmas carols and prepare a delicious snack for Grizzy before slipping out again. Suspicious, Grizzy follows them and discovers that the bag rewards persons whose wishes are equal to their goodwill.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings do not agree on which program to watch on TV. Grizzy confiscates the remote-control device. He thinks he’s won the battle, but the Lemmings find another one at the research station. A furious combat begins until the adversaries realize that the research station device has a special button that controls objects.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast racing down the ice slope in competition with the stuffed Bear-Ranger and manage to win each time. Grizzy cannot stand seeing his avatar humiliated and he decides to enter the competition to help him. Their frenzied descent gets out of hand and everyone is propelled all the way to the hangar of the research station, where they discover an ultra-sophisticated racing game. The racecourse sprawls over the entire icefield via drones that project holographic elements. Grizzy and the Lemmings get into super-fast snowmobiles and launch into the race of the century.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings shave ice from the icefield and whip it into granita, but the result is flavorless. He decides to make granita in an empty jar of Yummy so that the chocolate left over on the sides of the jar will flavor the dessert. It’s delicious! The Lemmings, who consider it was their recipe, swap the chocolate granita with another one made in an old flowerpot with potting soil. The choco-granito race is off and running!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are starving for their reserves are depleted and their fishing has been unsuccessful. Fortunately, a truck delivers a crate of edibles to the research station that contains compact food cubes. When placed under a special light beam, the cubes retransform into delicious meals. Grizzy discovers that the decompressing lamp can, conversely, compact organic elements too. For example, the Lemmings.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport – she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - don’t worry, we’ll have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irma’s brochure – a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But he’s so engrossed he doesn’t notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock – Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Outrageous Acts Of Science
programme.desc: The smartest and bravest people use science to take their skills to the next level, from using a vacuum cleaner as a didgeridoo to creating a mechanised super suit.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Dark matter is one of the greatest mysteries of the universe facing scientists today. Could it be the cause of supermassive black holes and mass extinctions?

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Discoveries of new planets have revealed countless worlds much stranger than Earth. Some of these strange worlds dont have stars, others are made out of diamonds. Will we ever find a planet like Earth, or are these distant worlds stranger than fiction?

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Astronauts on the Apollo 12 mission return home with a something alive from the moon; The National Aeronautics and Space Administration tracks an asteroid headed towards Earth, but they discover the object is artificial.

programme.title: Incredible Engineering Blunders: Fixed
programme.desc: Justin uncovers the truth behind a landslide that wiped out a ski-jump resort in Turkey, before jetting off to Gibraltar to see an airport runway built across a road.

programme.title: Incredible Engineering Blunders: Fixed
programme.desc: Would you ever believe a skyscraper can melt a car? Justin heads to Londons Walkie Talkie building to unearth the science behind this building blunder.

programme.title: Blowing Up History
programme.desc: Today experts are investigating Alcatrazs remarkable engineering secrets. Theyre uncovering the Rocks forgotten past, protecting its concrete cells, and exploring why so many convicts tried and failed to escape the toughest jail in America.

programme.title: Blowing Up History
programme.desc: The Iceman is the worlds oldest and most perfectly preserved mummy, and brand-new cutting-edge forensic technology is revealing his darkest secrets; these discoveries could change everything we know about the humans who lived 5,000 years ago.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: Picture your dream car - does it look like a Jaguar XF? The crew go to its birthplace, revealing the inner workings and stunning exterior.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: Picture your dream car - does it look like a BMW M6? The crew go to its birthplace, revealing the inner workings and stunning exterior.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The crew goes to its birthplace, revealing the inner workings and stunning exterior of the Rolls-Royce Dawn, regarded by many as a dream car.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How do they make the king of cheeses, Parmesan? How do they keep the runways running at the worlds busiest airports? And, how do they manufacture relaxing reclining chairs?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: A look at ways to weave an authentic Turkish carpet, and how helicopter blade technology is being used to make cross country skis. Plus, the practicalities behind the Niagara Falls.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Recent discoveries could explain how supermassive black holes grow so big, one of the universes most mysterious questions. Neither dark matter nor cannibalism can fully explain these monsters, but the latest science might finally provide an answer.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Life once existed on Mars, but a series of devastating mass extinctions have made present-day life nearly impossible. The latest science shows how Martian life keeps bouncing back as it transforms from a blue watery world like Earth into a desert planet.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: The universe holds real-life Death Stars that are capable of destroying planet Earth, and terrifying secrets of NASAs six deadliest are shown, like vampire stars, supernovas than can vaporize an entire planet, and unpredictable stars gone rogue.

programme.title: Dino Hunters
programme.desc: Clayton continues his excavation of a rare, carnivorous dinosaur on his Montana ranch. In Wyoming, Mike and Jake prepare to sell their prized T-Rex fossil.

programme.title: Richard Hammonds Big
programme.desc: Richard explores one of the worlds biggest man-made engineering projects: the Kolnbrein Dam, which can hold back an incredible 200 million tonnes of water!

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The crew head to the birthplace of the Morgan 3-Wheeler in England where the cars inner workings and gorgeous exterior are examined.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: Ginetta and Team LNT are synonymous with racing, making headway in auto racing history for decades. The crew head to its birthplace, revealing the inner workings.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Louisale tuleb ootamatult kulla isa, kes peaks vanglas istuma. Selgub, et Terry on suremas ja vabastati tingimisi, kuid Martin hakkab diagnoosis kahtlema. Ruth teeb Martinile veriseid ullatusi. Bertilt tahetakse haagis ara osta, kuid selles elab noormees, keda ei saa valja visata.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Maria ja Henry uurivad Tiinalt ratsepaameti kohta. Alma keelab Haraldil Lainet kosida. Mare kulastab Jaanust. Annelit huvitab Are korter.

programme.title: Eesti mang
programme.desc: Sel nadalal astuvad Eesti mangus võistlustulle leiutaja ja Energia avastuskeskuse hing Aare Baumer, Vabamu juht Ivo Lille ning ERMi juht Laura Kipper. Kusimusi esitab ja saadet juhib Gaute Kivistik.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Pitsi kudumiseks peab olema palju kannatust ja kuna seda on peetud ikka naiste tooks, siis on vaja olla julge poiss, et hakata pitsi kuduma. Vanaema kõrval hakkas Riho Toomrat juba poisikesena pits ja selle tegemine huvitama ja nuud võib meister valja panna uhke naituse. Juttu ajas Aivi Parijõgi.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Petra eitab, et Feliciano on ta poeg. Markiis ulatab Pelayole abikae. Jana taipab, et María peidukoht võib olla nõgeste lahedal. Martina kurvastab Leonori kaitumise parast.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Haiglasse tuuakse vahihaige Anu, kes loodab saada terveks tanu positiivsele mõtlemisele. Teda ravides tekib Santeri ja Leevi vahel lahem suhe. Üksildane Jari kannatab unetuse all ja võtab unerohtu vahetult enne seda, kui ta kutsutakse erakorralisele opile. Patsiendil tekib lõikusel eluohtlik olukord.

programme.title: Maailm ja mõnda
programme.desc: Valdur Mikita jagab Laoses Luang Prabangi linnas, hommikul kell 5.30, buda munkadele riisi. See on uks hingepuhastav rituaal. Toidu jagamine on ju samuti uks palvetamise vorme. Olemise ilu - selline võiks olla uks Laose marksõnu. Laoses veedetud aeg on nagu pikk meditatsioon, mille kaigus muutud ka ise paremaks inimeseks. Osalesime ka veel baci tseremoonial. Laose kuningapaleest lahkus kuningas alles 1975. aastal, kuid palee endine hiilgus on alles. Ou Paki koopasse on palverandurid viinud ule 1000 buda kuju. Sinna saab ainult paadiga mooda Mekongi jõge ja see sõit on omaette elamus. Kõige kõrgemasse koopasse jõudmiseks tuleb ronida ules kolmesajast trepiastmest, kuid see tasub ennast ara. Laoses filmisid Valdur Mikita, Tiina Park ja Marianne Kõrver. Saate tootis Free Studio.

programme.title: Madat omenat
programme.desc: Onerva puuab Vera perekonnale teada anda, et viimane on teistest eraldatud ja uimastatud. Lundsteni saadab tema uurimistoos edu, kui tal õnnestub manipuleerida Serafina malestustega.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Politseijaoskond on šokis Tomi vagivaldse surma parast. Mertonit suudistatakse kotiroovis. Kui Bernie teist noorust naudib, peab Vernon uksi taksoari ajama.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Ivanil tekib nii Kristjani kui ka Lainega vaga hea klapp. Margna ja Põder kavatsevad linnapea vastu vandenõud alustada. Margna kulastab Jaanust. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: Ringvaade toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Tahelepanu! Tegemist on teadusega
programme.desc: Eesti teadlased teevad iga paev avastusi, mis aitavad muuta meie tulevikku targemaks, turvalisemaks ja põnevamaks. Klipisari viib vaataja laboritesse ja katsevaljakutele, kus sunnivad ullatuslikud ideed ning avanevad teadusmaailma salaparased telgitagused. Režissoor Maarika Lauri, toimetaja Marit Ummelas.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: Kaheosaline dokumentaal, mis jutustab, kuidas nõukogude ajal Eesti NSV naiste murdmaakoondise juures alustanud usinast ja uuenduslikust eesti treenerist sai rahvusvahelise murdmaasuusatamise uks mõjukam ning tuntum spetsialist, kes tõstis sportlasi olumpiapjedestaalidele, aga havitas ka karjaare. Ta palvis tunnustust, auhindu ja kiitust, aga pettis samal ajal keeruliste kombinatsioonidega dopingukontrolle, sponsoreid ning spordisõpru. Mati Alaver - valgusest varju on traagiline lugu poorasest vaimustusest ja rangast pettumusest, mille telgitagustes peitub palju pooltoone ning fakte, mida uldsus esimest korda kuuleb. Autor-stsenarist Mihkel Karmas, režissoorid Raivo Maripuu, Vladlen Pobjaržin, toimetajad Kristjan Pihl, Taavi Eilat, Merilin Parli, Uljana Kuzmina, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kõigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kõik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja režissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa.

programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Esimene stuudio
programme.desc: Saatesari avab erinevaid paevakajalisi teemasid, mis sunnivad meie igapaeva-elust, alates poliitikast ja majandusest, lõpetades sotsiaalia ning kultuuriga. Saatejuhid Andres Kuusk, Johannes Tralla, Mirko Ojakivi. Režissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Kirjandusministri juures. Muusika eri
programme.desc: Raamatuaasta puhul võõrustab kirjandusminister Mart Juur Eesti raamat 500 patrooni, president Alar Karist. Kord kuus raagime presidendi jaoks olulistest teostest. Tana kasitleme koos presidendi ja kulalistega Jaan Aru raamatut Ajust ja arust. Unest, teadvusest, tehisintellektist ja muust.

programme.title: Tõnis Magi. Vaikus valguses
programme.desc: Portreefilm Eesti muusika elavast legendist. Saranud aastakumneid mitte ainult kodumaa, vaid kogu kunagise Nõukogude Liidu rokitaevas, sai temast taasiseseisvumisaja suurim ja Eesti rahvast kõige jõulisemalt uhendav laulik. Labi varvika elu keerdkaikude on Tõnis jõudnud aarmiselt põneva maailmatunnetuseni, millest on kantud ka tema looming. Film annab vaatajale võimaluse õige lahedalt piiluda helilooja salaparasesse maailma ja olla kaasreisijaks teekonnal, mis muusikut inspireerib. Režissoor Priit Paasuke.

programme.title: Pea ees vette. Tai Kuningriigis
programme.desc: Seekordses osas teevad Milderid pai Tai rahvusloomale elevandile. Uuritakse lahemalt nende majesteetlike hiiglaste kaekaigu kohta tanases Tai Kuningriigis, kus võib kuulda rohkelt lugusid elevantide vaarkohtlemisest. Lisaks lastakse hea maitsta Tai magustoitudel ning kulastatakse templit, kus kaiakse Buda kaest rikkust ja lotoõnne palumas. Toimetaja Piret Jarvis-Milder, režissoor Egert Milder.

programme.title: Pealtnagija tahed
programme.desc: 2021. aasta seisuga oli Eestis kummekond inimest saanud asendussudame. Sõna saavad kirurgid Gunter Taal ja Karl Lemstrom, siirdatud sudamega inimesed Heli Pilt ja Urmas Roostar ning Urmase abikaasa Katrin Roostar. Reporter on Taavi Eilat.

programme.title: Ludwig
programme.desc: Parast salaparase markmiku leidmist puuab Ludwig jalgida venna viimaseid samme. Mõisa mõistatuslik juhtum osutub arvatust sungemaks. Samal ajal alustab Lucy omaenda uurimist.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Blaketon kandideerib kohalikel valimistel Joyce Jowetti vastaskandidaadina. Ta saab Bernie suure toetuse, kuna mees on avalike kaimlate vastu, mis asuvad otse tema tookoja ukse ees. Harvey Cotrelli jõhkrad arivõtted teevad temast vargusintsidendi peasuudlase. Kohalik aknapesija on usin fotograaf.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Kristjan kaib Johannese juures viinapudeliga riiki kirumas. Linnapea keelab Raimil linna infolehte avaldamast. Allan teeb Arele tõsisema ettepaneku. Evelinil on Tallinnas olemisest stress ja Georg uritab teda rahustada. Ise saab ta aga kummalise telefonikõne. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.desc: Jari uritab oma viga parandada ja teeb hirmunud Pekkale uue lõikuse. Ka Anu nõustub viimaks operatsiooniga, kuid paraku selgub, et on juba liiga hilja. Leevi pakub tuge Santerile, kes on patsiendi saatusest šokis. Marjut ja Jari leiavad raske paeva lõpus uhise keele.

programme.title: La Promesa

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri dives into killer culinary and cocktails, from an over-the-top Mexican spot in San Antonio, TX, to a hidden speakeasy in Brunswick, GA.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four chefs find a biggie piggy surprise in the appetiser basket and get a bit overzealous pounding pork for their entree.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert has 48 hours to rescue Big Toms Backyard Grill and Bar in Cleveland, Tennessee. This failing restaurant is costing owners Tom and Sabrina their marriage.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
